channel.title: [Delta] HeadIcons Prayer, skulling [Fixed]

item.title: [Delta] HeadIcons Prayer, skulling [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: @Mario_PvP Mario PvP
item.description:
@Mario_PvP wrote:

Hello,
Iâ€™ve got my headIcons client-side done.
I also got the getHead and checkHead method.
I just need to know where to place those methods.

public void checkHead(){
    if(!isSkulled){
    headIcon = -1;
    skullIcon = -1;
    }
    if(isSkulled){
    headIcon = -1;
    skullIcon = 0;
    }
}
public void getHead(){
    if(ProtMage)
    headIcon = 2;
    if(ProtRange)
    headIcon = 1;
    if(ProtMelee)
    headIcon = 0;
    if(Retribution)
    headIcon = 3;
    if(Redemption)
    headIcon = 5;
    if(Smite)
    headIcon = 4;
    if(isSkulled)
    skullIcon = 0;
    else if(!ProtMage && !ProtRange && !ProtMelee && !Retribution && !Redemption && !Smite)
    headIcon = -1;
}

Read full topic
